oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-05-19 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 19, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Marty Robbins (host/performer), guest performer Goldie Hill, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Marty Robbins; Rod Brasfield; Goldie Hill; Tommy Jackson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Marty Robbins -- Long Tall Sally (Marty Robbins) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Marty Robbins introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Marty Robbins introduces Goldie Hill -- I'm Beginning To Feel Mistreated (Goldie Hill) -- Marty Robbins introduces Tommy Jackson -- Sally Gooden (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Marty Robbins talks -- Who At My Door Is Standing (Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert jingle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Wood, Del; Atkins, Chet; Jackson, Tommy; Robbins, Marty; Hill, Goldie
